price: 122. Mpe topesaki ye bolamu kati na mokili, mpe ya soló, ye o mokolo mwa suka akozala o kati ya bato malamu.
arabic: وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَا حَسَنَةٗۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waātaynāhu fī al-dun'yā ḥasanatan wa-innahu fī al-ākhirati lamina al-ṣāliḥīna
